Also, bonus question. Any idea why this aura wouldn't work?

 

It's modeled directly after a few others I have, which all work fine, but for some reason when I try to adapt it for Kil'jaeden it just...doesn't work.


> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy

Certainly could be caused by that error. Does this happen often, or only this one time?


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

For the Focused Dreadflame icon, it could possibly be that KJ isn't marked in the combat log as being the source of the cast. Try removing the source unit filter and see if that helps. It should work though - I checked BigWigs, and it watches for a SPELL_CAST_START combat log event for it (which is what you selected).


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

It happens every so often, certainly not COMMON by any means. Maybe a few times a week at most? Entering and exiting tmw config seems to fix it instantly.

 

And I'll try that for the KJ aura.


> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy

http://i.imgur.com/RRAhZuz.jpg

 

One more thing for you. The window for choosing config options sometimes scales with the size of the aura you right click.

 

E: Also I think I figured out the KJ aura. I had destination set to player when I don't care at all if he casts it on me...I must have been tired every time I looked at it.

E2: Ok the REAL reason it wasn't working (besides the player=destination) was that I had a group condition for mythic raid and I pulling heroic at the time. Lol.
